message: You're in luck! This is one of our top-of-the-line products, with a proven track record of excellence. We've sold 1 out of 3 products so far, and 1 of them was high-quality. The idea that the odds are stacked in my favor due to the lack of high-quality products sold so far is a misconception - each product's quality is independent of the others. I won't fall for the gambler's fallacy. I need more substantial reasons to make a purchase.
